inputs.name: tokens
inputs.description: List of addresses of ERC20 or ERC20Basic token contracts to refund.

abiDocs.name: destroy
abiDocs.notice: Terminate contract and refund to ownerThe called token contracts could try to re-enter this contract. Only supply token contracts you trust.

inputs.name: newOwner
inputs.description: The address to transfer ownership to.

abiDocs.name: transferOwnership
abiDocs.details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
